moves.1. e4: This is my first game in game knot.
moves.2. Nf3: I move Nf3. My favourite second move.
moves.2... f6: Black moves f6. Damiano defense. I learned this opening while playing in ps home.

moves.3... fxe5: Fxe5. Black is committing suicide here.
moves.4. Qh5+: Players that want to be success must learn this move.
moves.5. Qxe5+: Many grandmaster playing this. Look at the damiano defense database grandmaster games.
